name: Webble and Stoney
description:
Webble and Stoney love each other, but the tornado doesn't care. Webble will need to be a parkour pro to get to Stoney in time! 

💡Did You Know? There's 3 different endings. 

🎮Controls      

WASD/ARROWS to move

Space to jump

Escape for settings

There's also controller support! 

⏱️Play Time 3-15 minutes
